text:
klarx / Munich, Germany / Full Time & Internships / Onsite

We are creating the number one construction technology start up and are in one of the few fields of industry which acts like a digital green field, as it has almost not been touched by digitalization.

We're hiring Frontend, Backend and Fullstack. Our stack is mainly Ruby based, so pre experience with Ruby is a big plus.

https://www.klarx.de

Apply at v.koch@klarx.com
